title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Skills: Implementing Science Education Training Based on Flexible Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can develop effective response strategies in over 80% of unpredictable learning situations using flexible instructional methods.
Learners can enhance learner engagement by 30% or more by designing interactive learning modules based on mobile environments.
Learners can develop two or more creative instructional designs applicable to science education settings through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
